Question: This person and Fisher ended their relationship in early 1995, but remain friends and later worked together in True Crime.
Hints: This person was also cast as Two-Face in the Batman television show, but the series was canceled before filming began.
In preparation for filming this person rarely uses storyboards for developing the layout of a shooting schedule.
